price: “Mu by’ukuri ndi Nyagasani wawe, bityo kwetura inkweto zawe kuko uri mu kibaya gitagatifu cya Tuwa”,[1]
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى
footnotes: [1] Twuwa: Ni ikibaya gitagatifu kiri mu majyepfo y’umusozi wa Sinayi.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
